html:
4.26.18  2:02 pm   what foods are on the menu of creativity

     the menu is on the food

4.26.18  1:57 pm   what is the music theory behind those middle segments of 'and the day goes on' and 'La De Da De Da De Da De Day Oh' that make me feel very emotional / like i want to cry?

     which parts do you mean

4.26.18  1:39 pm   how hot is lava

     any temperature you choose

4.26.18  1:31 pm   Also, why did you record (and post) vlogs, journals, improv etc?

     i knew that one day it could be edited into something watchable. then one day i finally did

     Was it, like, just because you could? Or was there more intent there?

     the communicate my thoughts and ideas

     Are you ever going to do more?

     the process has been ongoing since at least 2009

4.26.18  1:23 pm   I was walking down a sidewalk when I saw a little melon man riding a flying chair. Can you relate?

     no

4.26.18  1:15 pm   what is the meaning of france?

     gaul

4.26.18  1:14 pm   4.25.18  11:09 am Can you tell me what your idea generating sessions are?

     just trying to think of ideas

     I think you've brought that up before in some other questions. Is it just sitting at the piano with the intention of writing a song,

     that's one way to do it

     or is there something in particular that you do that helps you 'generate' ideas?

     there are many things. at least half of them occur not on an idea session. just any time. one of the most important secrets to songwriting is being equipped to catch new ideas as they fall on you, throughout the day or night when you least expect

4.26.18  1:12 pm   Is Mark Zuccerburg watching my parents on Facebook?

     no but he is watching someone who is

4.26.18  1:11 pm   Why does Garfield like lasagna so much?

     because he was born in an italian restaurant

4.26.18  1:07 pm   Have you considered making music with others?

     a long time ago but i didn't get any results until i stopped considering it and started allowing myself to move forward, alone

4.26.18  1:07 pm   Should I feel obligated to contribute to the human race as a whole?

     take it a step further, should you feel obligated to feel obligated to do it

4.26.18  1:06 pm   Do you ever find your way of making money silly?

     no

4.26.18  1:05 pm   What does it take to reach true satisfaction?

     it helps to set up a number of fake satisfaction decoys, to distract others while you go for the true one

4.26.18  1:05 pm   What is our purpose?

     who's

4.26.18  1:02 pm   What Inspires you to make the type of Content that you make?

     the world i live in, and also my imagination

4.26.18  12:55 pm   is roy a good name?

     sure

4.26.18  12:55 pm   Do you think this statement is false?

     it's not a statement

4.26.18  12:54 pm   is death a common thought for you 

     no

4.26.18  12:53 pm   Teach me the ways of the piano

     piano teaches itself. every button tells you what it does

4.26.18  12:50 pm   oh and i wanna love and be loved

     ah, #relatable

4.26.18  12:46 pm   do you ever think about death 

     rarely

4.26.18  12:25 pm   what mode are you playin life?

     power mode

4.26.18  12:17 pm   i like sandwiches and i want to know whats your favorite sandwich

     the brandwich

4.26.18  12:16 pm   what's your opinion on the recent outbreak of E. coli in Romaine lettuce in several states within the US?

     there are many different opinions on this but my opinion is that it's bad

4.26.18  12:10 pm   what to wear in a black tie event, instead a black tie?

     a black dress

4.26.18  12:02 pm   what's the speed of light?

     1 lightyear per year

4.26.18  11:55 am   will you ever put posters on the merch store?

     maybe

4.26.18  11:43 am   what's your favourite day?

     "today"

4.26.18  11:42 am   any tips for someone wanting to create obscure tunes with no real meaning to them?

     no

4.26.18  10:47 am   does my father love me

     probably

4.26.18  10:21 am   opinion on the moon?

      it gets blamed for being 'crazy' and 'unstable' but is actually helping to stabilize earth

4.26.18  10:11 am   How do i build a train

     link some cars together

4.26.18  9:47 am   how come your lyrics page is wrong on the last line of the first verse of "and the day goes on"?

     ah, that could be what's known in the business as a 'mistake'

4.26.18  9:45 am   can you define happiness

     it always changes but sure

4.26.18  9:40 am   Have you ever eaten a sandwich on Mars?

     not that i can recall

4.26.18  9:39 am   How to win at life?

     it depends what mode you are playing

4.26.18  9:28 am   What do you think about music as a form of escapism? I've heard many people say that you should use music to express feelings about your life, but I have this tendency of closing myself in a sort of mental bubble and write music based on that instead... it's fun but doesn't really add anything to my real life.

     you just said it adds fun

      Do you know what I mean? Have you ever struggled with that?

     there are many ways to write music. almost all of them are fun

4.26.18  9:24 am   can you help me figure out a jazz chord? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xJOtaWyEzaI at 3:08 (the "peak" one, and the one before it maybe)

     the first one sounds like (from bottom to top) F, Gb, A, C, Eb, Bb. and the second one seems to be (from bottom to top) Gb, B, D, F, Bb

4.26.18  9:15 am   Where is Montana?

     somewhere in the rocky mountain range

4.26.18  9:05 am   How much thought and feeling do you put into songs that seem random, such as "smiling techniques"

     that doesn't seem random to me at all. if i recall, the words are "step 1 is to pretend that you're happy" which is very common smiling technique used all around the globe to this day

4.26.18  8:48 am   how do you keep yourself cool?

     i just use a wrist band

4.26.18  8:41 am   would you consider putting the i like song on itunes so i can spend legal tender on it?

     maybe but what you could do is just download it from the songs page and then drop a donation of your choice. or just listen and skip the donation. or just donate and skip the listen. or just skip everything. there are many possibilities, it's choose your own adventure

4.26.18  8:31 am   what do you think

     thoughts, and more

4.26.18  8:01 am   What do u think about math?

     it is an invaluable tool for the work place, or at home in your leisure time

4.26.18  7:52 am   u can't just go from virginia to outer space in one 8-bar verse

     watch me

4.26.18  7:52 am   Should I wear my lampshade as a hat?

     sure but you should probably pull it down over your eyes, if you turn your light on, because your light now has no shade on it

4.26.18  7:35 am   4.25.18  4:45 pm So were history of japan and hotewig just experiments then?

     history of japan was somewhat of an experiment. history of the entire world was less of an experiment

      You've also said that you wouldn't want to work with a large team, does that mean that we will never see anything longer than 4 minutes again?

     that would take many many months of production (which, as a side effect, means i can't produce anything else during that time, which by exetension, as a side effect of that, means i can't release anything else during that time) unless i decide to make the thing totally suck. neither of those choices seem like a particularly good career move, but i would consider it

4.26.18  7:13 am   Why do you answer questions with complex answers that raise more questions then before?

     to change it up, from all the times i have answered questions very simply and succinctly

4.26.18  6:53 am   have you ever made an intentionally bad song?

     sure

4.26.18  6:24 am   do you ever regret making a ueqstions page

     no
